title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to create responsive webhook systems for live health alerts so that elderly users and their caregivers can receive timely notifications for urgent care events.

title: Personalized Care Plan Integration
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to seamlessly integrate personalized care plans based on healthcare provider recommendations so that elderly users can receive tailored health management and timely notifications from their caregivers.

title: Timely Intervention Alerts – Emergency Notification System for Caregivers
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to build a system that provides timely notifications for urgent care events via automated callbacks so that caregivers can respond quickly and improve the quality of life for elderly users.

title: Secure Data Sharing Mechanism – User Consent Management for Data Sharing
summary: As a developer, I want to implement a secure data sharing mechanism that ensures user consent management, so that I can comply with healthcare regulations while providing seamless integration for healthcare applications.

title: Caregiver Collaboration Tools
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to implement caregiver collaboration tools for task assignment and tracking so that I can create a more effective and personalized care experience for elderly users and their caregivers.

title: Integration of Cognitive Health Assessment Tools
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to integrate cognitive health assessment results into care plans so that caregivers can receive timely and actionable insights to support elderly users' cognitive health.

title: Integration with Health Analytics Platforms
summary: As a developer, I want to seamlessly integrate ALFRED with external health analytics platforms so that I can enhance my applications with comprehensive health monitoring and analytics features for elderly users and their caregivers.
